title: cert
description: A digital signature relationship between an X.509 certificate and a file.

file.description: The file that the certificate metadata was parsed from.

subject.description: The subject identifier, commonly in X.500/LDAP format, to which the certificate was issued.

issuer.description: The Distinguished Name (DN) of the Certificate Authority (CA) which issued the certificate.

issuer:cert.description: The certificate used by the issuer to sign this certificate.

serial.description: The serial number string in the certificate.

version.description: The version integer in the certificate. (ex. 2 == v3 ).

validity:notbefore.description: The timestamp for the beginning of the certificate validity period.

validity:notafter.description: The timestamp for the end of the certificate validity period.

md5.description: The MD5 fingerprint for the certificate.

sha1.description: The SHA1 fingerprint for the certificate.

sha256.description: The SHA256 fingerprint for the certificate.

rsa:key.description: The optional RSA public key associated with the certificate.

signature.description: The hexadecimal representation of the digital signature.

ext:sans.description: The Subject Alternate Names (SANs) listed in the certficate.

ext:crls.description: A list of Subject Alternate Names (SANs) for Distribution Points.

identities:fqdns.description: The fused list of FQDNs identified by the cert CN and SANs.

identities:emails.description: The fused list of e-mail addresses identified by the cert CN and SANs.

identities:ipv4s.description: The fused list of IPv4 addresses identified by the cert CN and SANs.

identities:ipv6s.description: The fused list of IPv6 addresses identified by the cert CN and SANs.

identities:urls.description: The fused list of URLs identified by the cert CN and SANs.

crl:urls.description: The extracted URL values from the CRLs extension.

selfsigned.description: Whether this is a self-signed certificate.
